author: Jon Jackson
title: Andrew Cuomo Begins Political Comeback, Buys Ads After Probes Crumble
description: The former governor's spokesperson told Newsweek that advertisements have been produced, but a decision about what will run has not yet been made.
content:
Former New York Governor Andrew Cuomo is reportedly considering a return to the national stage, as evidenced by ads that could soon start appearing on television.
